name: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Butouden
overview: It is the fourth and final installment in the Butouden series. It features 27 playable characters, their sprites being those used in the earlier game "Dragon Ball Z - Ultimate Battle 22" for the Sony PlayStation. Also, the game's introduction is made with scenes recycled from the introduction of Ultimate Battle 22. It was released for the Sega Saturn exclusively in Japan in 1995.
